metadata.title: CVE-2011-3923 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Struts before 2.3.1.2 allows remote attackers to bypass securityprotections in the ParameterInterceptor class and execute arbitrarycommands.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
